sentences.en: Buses from the terminus go to the airport half an hour.
sentences.cn: 航空集散站每隔半小时有一辆客车开往机场.

sentences.en: Casablanca was the terminus of a long rickety railway line .
sentences.cn: 卡莎布兰卡是一长而软弱的铁路线的终点。

sentences.en: CUHK campus shuttle bus leaves the terminus at every 15 minutes.
sentences.cn: 大学穿梭校车于总站每15分钟开出一班.

sentences.en: Explain the locational advantages of the proposed West Kowloon terminus.
sentences.cn: 解释建议中西九龙总站的区位优势.

sentences.en: How much to the terminus, please?
sentences.cn: 请问,到终点站票价 多少 ?

sentences.en: I get on at the terminus.
Multi - bus terminus, to trade financial centre just five minutes.
sentences.cn: 多路公交车总站, 到商贸金融中心仅五分钟车程.

sentences.en: The next station is Nam Cheong Terminus, please alight of the left.
sentences.cn: 下一站系南昌终点站, 请用左边车门落车.

sentences.en: The passengers were transferred to a ferry at the bus terminus.
sentences.cn: 在公共汽车终点站乘客转上渡轮.

sentences.en: The people who settled the town called successively Terminus , Marthasville and Atlanta, were a pushy people.
sentences.cn: 在这个先后叫做特米尔纳斯、马撒斯维尔和亚特兰大的市镇落户的人, 都是很有闯劲的.

sentences.en: This is Tuen Mun Terminus, would all passengers leave the train.
sentences.cn: 下一站是屯门终点站, 乘客可在该站转乘轻铁.

sentences.en: This train will terminate there. All passengers please alight at this terminus.
sentences.cn: 本班车将以该站为终点站,所有乘客请在该站落车.

sentences.en: Trains vomit out crowds of passengers at a terminus.
sentences.cn: 成群的旅客在终点站从列车中挤出来.

sentences.en: We have arrived at the terminus. Passengers please alight.
sentences.cn: 终点站到了, 请乘客们下车.

sentences.en: What time does the train reach the terminus?
sentences.cn: 火车什么时间到达终点站?。

sentences.en: Wu Kai Sha Station will be the northern terminus of MOS Rail.
sentences.cn: 乌溪沙站是马铁的北行终点站,位于利安?

trans.tran_en: the station or stop at the end of a railway or bus line
